name: Igor Suhorukov
title: Big Data team lead
bio: Igor is [experienced JVM professional](https://www.linkedin.com/in/suhorukov) with deep knowledge of open source software and frameworks. [Speaker at conferences](https://dzone.com/articles/control-cnc-machine-using-java-or-groovy) and [popular blogger](https://habrahabr.ru/users/igor_suhorukov/topics/). Contributor of H2, schemaspy, [spring framework(top20)](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework/graphs/contributors) and [spring-boot(top20)](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/graphs/contributors) projects.)
